body.raw:
{
  "jobId": 4,
  "coverLetter": "With over 7 years of experience building scalable backend systems, I specialize in designing REST APIs with secure multi-tenant architectures. For this SaaS platform, I will implement robust user management with role-based access control, JWT authentication, and rate-limiting for security. I will integrate Stripe for payment processing, Redis for caching, and set up WebSocket-based real-time notifications. My development approach includes writing comprehensive unit and integration tests, setting up CI/CD pipelines, and delivering Dockerized services ready for AWS deployment. I will also provide detailed API documentation using OpenAPI/Swagger to ensure maintainability. You can expect a secure, scalable, and production-ready API.",
  "proposedRate": 5500.00,
  "deliveryDays": 50,
  "portfolioLinks": "https://github.com/yourusername, https://yourportfolio.com",
  "additionalNotes": "I will ensure the API follows best practices for SaaS scalability, including modular architecture, monitoring setup, and automated deployment. I can also advise on database optimization and future feature scaling. NDA and IP assignment are acceptable."
}

item.name: Get proposals for a job by jobid

body.raw:
{
  "jobId": 2,
  "cover": "I will deliver a robust MVP for your SaaS project.",
  "totalCents": 50000,
  "currency": "USD",
  "deliveryDays": 14,
  "milestones": [
    {
      "title": "Design UI",
      "description": "Deliver Figma mockups and design assets.",
      "amountCents": 15000,
      "currency": "USD",
      "dueDate": "2025-09-20",
      "orderIndex": 1
    },
    {
      "title": "Build Backend",
      "description": "Implement REST API and database models.",
      "amountCents": 35000,
      "currency": "USD",
      "dueDate": "2025-09-27",
      "orderIndex": 2
    }
  ]
}

{
  "proposalContent": "Dear Client,

I'm excited about your React dashboard project and confident I can deliver exactly what you need. With 5+ years of specialized React development experience, I've successfully built 15+ SaaS dashboards for companies ranging from startups to enterprise clients.

My expertise directly aligns with your requirements:
â€¢ Advanced React development with TypeScript
â€¢ State management using Redux and Context API
â€¢ RESTful API integration and data visualization
â€¢ Modern UI/UX with Material-UI and custom components
â€¢ Responsive design and cross-browser compatibility

Recent relevant projects:
1. Analytics Dashboard for FinTech Company - React, TypeScript, Redux, Chart.js
2. Project Management SaaS - Real-time updates, complex state management
3. E-commerce Admin Panel - Inventory management, sales analytics

Project Approach:
- Week 1-2: Setup, core components, and authentication
- Week 3-4: Dashboard features and API integration
- Week 5-6: Testing, optimization, and deployment

I follow agile methodology with daily progress updates and use Git for version control. All code includes comprehensive documentation and testing.

Budget: $3,500 - $4,500 (negotiable based on scope)
Timeline: 6 weeks
Availability: Can start immediately

I'd love to discuss your specific requirements and share my portfolio. Looking forward to collaborating with you!

Best regards,
John Developer",
  "jobDescription": "Looking for an experienced React developer to build a modern analytics dashboard for our SaaS platform. Must have experience with TypeScript, Redux, API integration, and data visualization."
}
